verses.verse: וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta thou shalt say בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, I אוֹדְךָ֣ <S%H3034><s%> 'od-Cha I will praise יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, O LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אָנַ֖פְתָּ <S%H599><s%> 'a-Naf-ta thee though thou wast angry בִּ֑י Bi; יָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> ya-Sho is turned away אַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-Cha with me thine anger וּֽתְנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> U-te-na-cha-Me-ni. and thou comfortedst

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> hin-Neh Behold אֵ֧ל <S%H410><s%> 'el Behold God יְשׁוּעָתִ֛י <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti [is] my salvation אֶבְטַ֖ח <S%H982><s%> 'ev-Tach I will trust וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not אֶפְחָ֑ד <S%H6342><s%> 'ef-Chad; and not be afraid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for עָזִּ֤י <S%H5797><s%> 'az-Zi [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <S%H2176><s%> ve-zim-Rat and [my] song יָ֣הּ <S%H3050><s%> yah for the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, JEHOVAH וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- has become לִ֖י li לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> Li-shu-'Ah. he also is become my salvation

וּשְׁאַבְתֶּם־ <S%H7579><s%> u-she-'av-tem- shall ye draw מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim water בְּשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <S%H8342><s%> be-sa-Son; Therefore with joy מִמַּעַיְנֵ֖י <S%H4599><s%> mi-ma-'ay-Nei out of the wells הַיְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> hay-shu-'Ah. of salvation

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֞ם <S%H559><s%> va-'a-mar-Tem shall ye say בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom And in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu, he הוֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> ho-Du Praise לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> kir-'U call בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> vish-Mo, upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> ho-Di-'u declare בָֽעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> va-'am-Mim among the people עֲלִֽילֹתָ֑יו <S%H5949><s%> 'a-li-lo-Tav; his doings הַזְכִּ֕ירוּ <S%H2142><s%> haz-Ki-ru make mention כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִשְׂגָּ֖ב <S%H7682><s%> nis-Gav is exalted שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo. that his name

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> zam-me-Ru Sing יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, unto the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for גֵא֖וּת <S%H1348><s%> ge-'Ut excellent things עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; for he hath done; מְיֻדַּעַת me-yud-da-'at כמוּדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> mu-Da-'at acknowledge קזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. in all the earth

צַהֲלִ֥י <S%H6670><s%> tza-ha-Li Cry out וָרֹ֖נִּי <S%H7442><s%> va-Ron-ni and shout יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> yo-She-vet thou inhabitant צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon; of Zion כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For גָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol for great בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <S%H7130><s%> be-kir-Bech in the midst קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Doosh [is] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh
